oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pearl Harbor Survivors with St. Francis of Assisi Catholic School students
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lee, Howard G.; Pearl Harbor; St. Francis of Assisi Catholic School; veterans;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of students from St. Francis of Assisi Catholic School in Cordova, TN pose with Pearl Harbor Survivors; Back row, left to right: Howard Lee, Bill Jim Davis, S. Caudill, and Pat Macintosh; Front Row, left to right: Vernon Lee, Howard Price, and David Davidson
